about_the_game:
Tired of bland, terrible-looking linear games without much gameplay, full of stereotypes and plot holes?
Good news: this game isn't bland.

Step into the hilarious world of Isekaing - truly triple-N(iche) game that combines parody, musical and quest genres into an unholy abomination that will challenge your very sanity!

Zoe Powell is hit by the Truck-kun, and respawns into a pixel-art video game, where she must face dangers in form of cliché, meaningless choices, a plot that has more holes than Swiss cheese, and other plagues of modern gaming. Also, every notable person is trying to sing her a song! Will she endure this torment? Probably yes, because she is the protagonist, but you can still buy this game and find out!

(CAUTION! Press "read more" button, or you will make one lonely goblin sad!)

Here, you will be able to:

- Listen to shitton of dialogue that attempts to be funny

- Solve stupidly easy puzzles

- Enjoy (or suffer) the occasional singing

- Try to figure out all the game, movie, or other pop-culture references

- Be offended by everything (but that is not necessary)




So what are you waiting for? Yet another Isekai world awaits a new hero to save it!



Seriously, why are you still reading this? Buy! The! Game!
Don't you have wallets or something?

content_descriptors.notes: All adult content in this game is used only in satirical manner, serving as a parody to specific stereotypes. Therefore, there is no explicit content in the game as such, but there are many humorous hints about it, and a bit of cartoonish violence.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 790 MB RAM
  • Additional Notes: The system requirements same as in windows, game starts via Proton automaticly
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 24.04.1
  • Memory: 790 MB RAM
  • Additional Notes: The system requirements same as in windows, game starts via Proton automaticly

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Old, broken windows
  • Processor: Hamster in a wheel
  • Memory: 1984 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Some Radionator or Geforcer
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 790 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Capable of playing our magnificent songs (so any)
  • Additional Notes: Good sense of humor, critical thinking.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 790 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended, but not required.

short_description: Zoe is hit by the Truck-kun, and respawns in a pixel-art game, where she must face dangers in form of clichés, meaningless choices, a plot that has more holes than Swiss cheese, and other plagues of modern gaming. Also, every notable person is trying to sing her a song! Will she endure such torment?
